title: Checkbox Mirror
description: This video looks at how to read the pixels from a live video and alter DOM elements (checkboxes) to create an abstract mirror.

codeExamples.title: Checkbox Mirror
codeExamples.description: The sketch creates an abstract brightness mirror using DOM elements!
